J

JaxRsAsyncHalResponseRenderer - Interface in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.jaxrs.api
A service that asynchronously renders a LinkableResource to a JAX-RS AsyncResponse, and handles any errors that happen during rendering
JaxRsBundleInfo - Interface in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.jaxrs.api
Provides information about the OSGi bundle version and the base-path of the Application contained in the bundle
JaxRsLinkBuilder<JaxRsResourceType> - Interface in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.jaxrs.api
 

P

processRequest(UriInfo, AsyncResponse, Function<CaravanRhyme, RequestContextType>, Function<RequestContextType, ? extends LinkableResource>) - Method in interface io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.caravan.api.CaravanRhymeRequestCycle
Handles the full request cycle: Create a CaravanRhyme instance Pass that instance on to the given function to create a request context instance Pass that context on to the given function to create the resource implementation to be rendered Render the resource using the JaxRsAsyncHalResponseRenderer service Catch and handle any exceptions that are thrown in the previous steps

R

respondWithError(Throwable, UriInfo, AsyncResponse, RequestMetricsCollector) - Method in interface io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.jaxrs.api.JaxRsAsyncHalResponseRenderer
Render a response for an exception that was caught before a LinkableResource was created

S

setResponseMaxAge(Duration) - Method in interface io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.caravan.api.CaravanRhyme
Limit the maximum time for which the response should be cached by clients and downstream services.
